attributes.action: Stop the naming of people charged with sex offences until a verdict of guilty has has been reached in court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For people falsely accused of sex offences the stigma will remain with them forever, there will always be a cloud over their head. For some it could mean they lose their family, home or even in some cases feel the need to take their life. We ask that the Government recognises this as unjust and to correct the law.
